recipesJson.name: Khanjar
recipesJson.author: method1
recipesJson.description:
An exotic orange & mint turkish tobacco, with a touch of ancient turkish kentucky bourbon.
Dedicated to all the crew and extras in low-budget post-apocalyptic movies.

reviews.text: I really like this as a late night vape. Not too heavy but at the same time it really intrigues the palate and changes as you vape it. It's a perfect before bedtime vape while reading a book.
